TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Fegel - ein... Fegel - zwei... Fegel - drei! That's it,

I wish 1.13 gets released before 1.12.

Granted, you break the space time continuum and you are spaghettified into oblivion, destroying the universe, and the only remnants of the entire universe are an old VCR with a tape of a demolition excavator working, a 1:50 scale model LTM 1050 mobile crane, and a bowl of soup.

[snip]

Granted.

And the Don't Click.

Granted, you click, and a Concorde that was stolen from a museum crashed into your house at mach 2.

I wish that you had given a better corruption to my previous wish, but also that you could make it a reality.

Granted. You now have a Mine truck full of Legos tomato paste.

I wish I had had twice as much sleep as what I actually got.

Edited June 16, 2021 by ColdJ
Tomato paste

Granted, but you get tired twice as easily.

I wish people would read the fine print so the mods don’t have to lock the Megathread.

Granted. But they pay it no heed and do what they want and get it locked anyway.

 

I actually just wish for a sandwich. Missed lunch.

Granted, you feel the urge to make yourself a sandwich.

I wish I had a sandwich instead of a bowl of cereal for lunch.

Granted. You get a cereal sandwich.

I wish you like cereal sandwiches.

Granted, as long as there is no milk on it.

I wish that I had the RC Lego Liebherr R9800 Mining Excavator.

Granted but it didn't come with the hydraulic pistons so it becomes a glorified snow plow.

I wish there were more hours in the day.

Granted, one day becomes 2,000 hours

I wish I had a Lego Liebherr R9800 mining excavator with all the parts.

Granted. It came in all of the individual atoms.

 

I wish for more cheese.

Hey, folks, we've had to snip some posts where there was discussion of moderator action taken on another thread.  The guidelines moderators have to follow requires us to edit or remove content that violates community standards. The guidelines which have been ignored in this thread are:

Forum Guideline 2.2q: Reposting closed or removed content without moderator consent. 

Forum Guideline 3.3: Do not openly discuss action (or inaction) taken by the staff (bans, warnings etc.). If you have concerns about a moderator action, see 3.4 below.

Forum Guideline 3.4 (for clarification): All of the moderators are active community members who try to set a good example and apply the rules as appropriately as possible, but they are only human and can make mistakes from time to time. If you disagree with something they have done, please contact them or a senior moderator privately, and the issue will be re-examined.

IN A BRIEF SUMMARY:

  • Quit posting about the actions we had to take in one thread in multiple threads across the forum.
  • If you have a comment, a complaint, or question about our moderation actions, reach out to the moderation team and discuss those issues in a PM. You are always welcome to reach out to @Vanamonde, who is the moderator who has the final say if you do not want to discuss things with other moderators.
  • Continued posting about moderator action/breaking the forum guidelines you agreed to follow when you created your forum account, can lead to us being forced to issue official warnings to those who want to continue to not abide by the forum guidelines. This includes and is not limited to official warnings or being assessed infraction points (enough of these can limit your ability to post for a while).

Granted, have fun on the moon.

@adsii1970, you didn’t make a wish 

I wish for fish.

Granted. However the fish you receive is the dreaded Candiru!

My wish is a dish made of fish; sushi that is so delish!

Granted. You have a jellyfish sushi and no wasabi.

I wish they just make a mustard ketchup to use just one plastic bottle instead of two.

Granted. But it tastes horrible and the resulting colour makes the average person want to throw up.

I wish there was a free and easy, but good and reliable way to convert other 3d models available online into KSP *.mu model files that work exactly as you want them to.

Granted. All of the polygons that make up the models are now jumbled together, resulting in a chaotic mess.

 

I wish I had some chicken with me at this moment.

Granted. Chicken toe nail coming your way.

I wish people would comprehend specifics more.

granted, but idk wut comprehend is so i change it to .com

i wish this is nut corrputed

Edited June 16, 2021 by JB182
wrong person

Granted. Cashews, Almonds,Walnuts,Hazelnuts,Peanuts,Macadamias.

I wish for @JB182to be in a youtube video where 2 Concordes are having a dogfight.

Granted, but i lose my concorde save file was deleted.

i wish concorde flies again.

Granted, it's a scale model of the Concorde.

I wish that I could make a wish.

Granted. Your wish has granted even more wishes, and those wishes will continue to grant ever more wishes, until the universe is full of wishes and crashes due to stack overflow.

 

I wish for an additional room in my house.
